messages: 716ac33f581b6cbc15f40e51bc3652aa (03:02): can anyone recommend a tool that would allow me to verify TCP/IP transfer speeds between two arbitrary hosts on a switch?

a1321e670b563767f1fe1b65dfce8330 (03:16): openvpn question here.  i am running mandriva 2k6.  coming in on openvpn i can see the packets getting directed to eth1.  however, they never make it to tun0.  is this something that can be managed via an iptables rule to redirect any traffic to and from the openvpn server port

a1321e670b563767f1fe1b65dfce8330 (03:23): well, there will be eventually different mapsets that can be loaded, maybe switching from one to the other, that is where i thought the data translation would be necessary
93dede99112199d049a1bc421e564cd4 (03:25): can anyone shed some light on what is going on in this ip_conntrack data? http://linuxnet.ca/ip_conntrack
